text: Sir David Rendel Kingston Gascoigne (born 15 January 1940) is a New Zealand lawyer and former judicial conduct commissioner. He is the husband of Dame Patsy Reddy, who was the 21st governor-general of New Zealand from 2016 to 2021. In 1989, Gascoigne was appointed a Commander of the Order of the British Empire. In 2021, Gascoigne was appointed an additional Companion of the Queen's Service Order. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand lawyers
title: David Gascoigne
